jd: From: Devan, Maintec Technologies devan@maintec.com Reply to: devan@maintec.com Location: Omaha NERole: Scrum Master / Project ManagerMust-Have Skills:Core Scrum Master / Project Management SkillsExperience with JIRACollaboration with Stakeholders and Teams Good-to-Have Skills:SAP Project ManagementAtlassian ToolsMS SharePoint / Teams ExperienceDesired profile:serves as scrum master for 2-3 agile teamsorganizes and facilitates agile team activities and ceremonies (e.g. planning, daily stand-up, backlog refinement, showcase, and retrospectives).in a scaled agile model, facilitates scaled planning for the team—e.g. pre-planning/preparation, pi planning events and represents the team at broader planning and coordination sessions.comfortable experimenting with a variety of approaches based on need & fit. promotes the use of/experimentation with quality/engineering practices.collaborates with the product owner(s) to ensure the team has a healthy product and sprint backlog.coaches the team towards the importance of regular sprint showcase to demonstrate finished work to stakeholders and celebrates team achievements.manages and helps the team implement areas of improvement as identified in the retrospective.facilitates dependency management/risk management/impediment removal for the team.works with product owners and program managers to understand the product roadmap, priorities, and schedules to guide delivery.understands and utilizes lean-agile metrics to help teams continually improve. assesses the agile/scrum maturity of the team & coaches the team to higher levels of maturity.coaches team members and partners with other scrum masters regarding adoption of agile standards, tools, and best practices to improve collaboration and self-management, promoting healthy interactions both with team and with external stakeholders.supports the team in using agile planning and development tools (e.g. jira, sharepoint, m365, etc.).awareness of agile technology practices, techniques, and devops (e.g., user stories, test driven development, continuous integration, continuous testing, pairing, automated testing).knowledge on agile development methodology.
